Kelp is a sophisticated initiative that focuses on the development of personalized small language models. These models are designed to cater to the unique needs of both individuals and businesses, providing them with tailored AI solutions.
The founder of Kelp is Elamparithi Kavi Elango.

Elamparithi Kavi Elango, who holds an MS in Management & Systems from New York University, is the individual credited with founding Kelp. Kelp is an innovative project focused on developing private small language models, designed to cater to the specific needs of individuals and businesses.
